definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico
ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead
solder mask (applied to a circuit board)

sentences.english: Used thermosetting printing ink (environmental protection printing ink) all are harmless to the environment and the human body.
sentences.chinese: 我们的印唛烫画全部采用环保油墨，对人体无害。

sentences.english: Rosin modified nonylphenol resin is used as the linking mater ial in printing-inks.
sentences.chinese: 松香改性壬基酚醛树脂用于油墨连结料。
使用通过ISO认证的环保油墨印制。

sentences.english: The viscosity of the ink will influence the transfer rate of printing ink and image quality.
sentences.chinese: 油墨的黏度会影响油墨的转移率和印刷图像质量。

sentences.english: The viscosity of the ink will influence the transfer rate of printing ink and image quality.
sentences.chinese: 油墨的黏度会影响油墨的转移率和印刷图像质量。

sentences.english: Believe that cigarette packaging rotogravure printing ink needs will increase.
sentences.chinese: 猜忌烟包不凸版油墨的需求也会因此补充。

sentences.english: Minute white spots appear in images caused by lack of ink transfer.
sentences.chinese: 印刷时，油墨没有转移纸上，印纹露出白点的情况。

sentences.english: Automatically scrape bleeding ink beneath screen frame.
sentences.chinese: 纲板下方自动刮清油墨。

sentences.english: The ink additional solution influences on matching of inks significantly.
sentences.chinese: 油墨辅助剂对油墨适性调节具有很关键的影响。

sentences.english: The ink additional solution influences on matching of inks significantly.
sentences.chinese: 油墨辅助剂对油墨适性调节具有很关键的影响。

sentences.english: Acetone Volatile, fast-drying solvent used mainly in gravure inks.
sentences.chinese: 挥发及快干溶剂，主要用于照相凹版油墨。

sentences.english: It points out the development trend of water-based ink finally.
sentences.chinese: 最后指明了水性油墨的发展趋势。

sentences.english: Produce a wide range of brilliant 8-color output with 28 picoliter ink drops.
sentences.chinese: 生产一系列卓越的八色输出，带28皮升油墨滴。

sentences.english: Used in printing ink, car paint, motor paint and the high quality industry paint.
sentences.chinese: 用于油墨，汽车漆，摩托车漆和高品质的工业漆。

sentences.english: The book which I bought this morning smelled printing ink.
sentences.chinese: 我今天上午买的书还散发着油墨味。

sentences.english: The compression performance of offset rubber sheet was related to the ink transfer closely.
sentences.chinese: 胶印橡皮布的压缩性与油墨转移紧密相关。

definition: intaglio printing plate (or a print made with it)
color printing using several overlaid images
